goal:
Loyal Advisory is a management consulting firm established to provide organizations with the stakeholder centric framework.

Loyal Advisory aims to identify and to create shared value between clients and stakeholders.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Communication, Consumers, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Sport, Youth
